item.title: Performance is a Feature
item.description: The phrase “Performance is a Feature” has been growing in popularity. Lately, it’s importance for me is underlined by the fact the most common response I get from showing off my early-stage mailing list archive, Grokbase, is that “it’s fast.” I first heard this idea similarly phrased in Google’s Think Quartlerly and then in Jeff Atwood’s Coding Horror which was covered on Hacker News.
